title: Hollywood Cowboy
description: [Siren Ménage Erotic Ménage a Trois Contemporary Cowboy Romance, M/M/F, M/M] Alex anticipates an easy film shoot and a lot of hot sex with his new lover, Dallas Torres. With a stalker on his trail, he and Dallas went to the police station. The last person Alex expects to see is the girl he left behind. He certainly never figured his old feelings for her would reawaken. Molly is less than thrilled to see Alex back in town. She's moved on and happy with her life as Cold Creek, Texas' chief of police until Alex and Dallas arrived in her office. Now, the old feelings are back along with some interesting new ones for Dallas. Dallas is attracted to Molly, and he wants her along with Alex. All he has to do is bring them together. But the stalker pursuing Alex has other plans for them all. "I live in an area that has produced a few famous names and I got to wondering what it would be like for an actor to go back to his home town to film a movie. And yes, I had two actors in mind when I wrote this book, and no I'm not telling who. You'll have to guess. Then I asked myself what if a stalker was after him and Hollywood Cowboy was born." ~Ellen A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Ellen Starr
